**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 116 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Lesson** [Lesson of Favors](/Lessons.aspx?ID=13) **Cast** 10 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)) **Duration** 24 hours --- This spell wards against those who attempt to subvert your mind and turns mental magic back on them. When the spell is complete, you gain the Fight with Fear reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends. **Fight with Fear** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** A creature that you can see uses a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect against you; **Effect** The triggering creature must attempt a Will save, which has the following effects. **Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature is [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), and you gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throw or other defense against the triggering mental effect.
**Critical Failure** The creature is frightened 2, and you're unaffected by the triggering mental effect.
name: Mind of Menace
